tasks.title: Setup React Labor Market Dashboard App
tasks.description: Create new React app with TypeScript configuration for the Labor Market Dashboard
tasks.details: Initialize a new React application in apps/labor-market-dashboard using Vite as the build tool. Configure TypeScript with strict mode, set up Tailwind CSS for styling, and integrate with the existing Turborepo configuration. Include package.json with React 18+, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS, and configure build/dev scripts to work with the monorepo structure.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify app starts correctly with 'pnpm dev', builds successfully with 'pnpm build', and integrates properly with turbo commands. Test TypeScript compilation and Tailwind CSS integration.

tasks.title: Define TypeScript Data Model and Tree Structure
tasks.description: Implement the core TypeScript interfaces for tree data structure and state management
tasks.details: Create src/types/tree.ts with TreeNode interface containing id, label, percentage, absoluteValue, genderSplit, children, defaultPercentage, and isLocked properties. Define DashboardState interface for totalPopulation, balanceMode, and tree root. Implement utility types for gender split calculations and balance modes ('auto' | 'free').
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for type definitions, test tree node creation and manipulation, validate TypeScript compilation without errors, test interface compatibility with expected data structures.

tasks.title: Create Ukraine Labor Market Default Data
tasks.description: Implement comprehensive Ukrainian labor market data based on PRD specifications
tasks.details: Create src/data/defaultTree.ts with complete 3-level hierarchy: gender (52% male, 48% female) → 15+ industries → 75+ subcategories. Include all data from PRD sections 6 and Appendix with exact percentages, absolute values (13,500k total), and gender splits for each category. Structure data as nested TreeNode objects matching the TypeScript interfaces.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate data integrity: percentages sum to 100% at each level, absolute values calculate correctly, all required categories present, gender splits are realistic, test data loading and tree traversal.

subtasks.title: Extract and Structure Gender-Level Data Foundation
subtasks.description: Create the foundational data structure with gender split (52% male, 48% female) and establish the TypeScript interfaces and basic tree structure
subtasks.details: Create src/data/defaultTree.ts file and implement TreeNode TypeScript interfaces. Define the root gender level with 52% male (7,020k people) and 48% female (6,480k people) totaling 13,500k. Set up the nested data structure foundation that will support the 3-level hierarchy (gender → industries → subcategories). Include proper TypeScript types for all data fields including percentages, absolute values, and nested children arrays.
subtasks.testStrategy: Validate that gender percentages sum to 100%, absolute values total 13,500k, TypeScript interfaces compile correctly, and basic tree structure is properly defined

subtasks.title: Implement 15+ Industry Categories with Gender Splits
subtasks.description: Add all industry categories from PRD Section 6 with accurate percentages and gender distribution for each industry
subtasks.details: Implement the complete set of 15+ industry categories from the PRD, including: Agriculture/Forestry, Manufacturing, Construction, Trade, Transport, Hospitality, Information/Communication, Finance, Real Estate, Professional Services, Public Administration, Education, Healthcare, Arts/Entertainment, and Other Services. Each industry must include total percentage of workforce, absolute values, and gender split percentages. Ensure mathematical accuracy where all industry percentages sum to 100% within each gender category.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify all industries sum to 100% for both male and female categories, validate absolute values calculate correctly from percentages, ensure all required industries from PRD are included

subtasks.title: Create 75+ Detailed Subcategories Structure
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive subcategory breakdown for each industry with detailed data from PRD Appendix
subtasks.details: Add all 75+ subcategories from the PRD Appendix, organized under their respective industry parents. Each subcategory must include specific percentages within its parent industry, absolute worker counts, and gender distribution. Examples include subcategories like 'Crop Production', 'Livestock', 'Food Manufacturing', 'Textile Production', etc. Maintain the hierarchical structure where subcategories nest under industries which nest under gender categories. Ensure data consistency and mathematical accuracy throughout the hierarchy.
subtasks.testStrategy: Validate that subcategory percentages sum to 100% within each parent industry, verify absolute values flow correctly through the hierarchy, test that all 75+ subcategories from PRD are implemented

subtasks.title: Add Data Validation and Integrity Checks
subtasks.description: Implement comprehensive validation functions to ensure data mathematical accuracy and integrity across all hierarchy levels
subtasks.details: Create validation functions that verify: 1) All percentages sum to 100% at each hierarchy level, 2) Absolute values calculate correctly from percentages and parent totals, 3) Gender splits are realistic and consistent, 4) All required categories from PRD are present, 5) No data inconsistencies exist. Add automated checks that can be run during build/test phases. Include error reporting for any data integrity issues. Create helper functions for data traversal and mathematical verification of the complete tree structure.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run validation functions against complete dataset, verify all mathematical relationships are correct, test error detection for intentionally broken data, ensure validation covers all hierarchy levels and data fields

tasks.title: Implement Core State Management and Auto-Balance Logic
tasks.description: Build state management system with auto-balance algorithm for slider interactions
tasks.details: Create src/hooks/useTreeState.ts for managing tree state and src/hooks/useAutoBalance.ts for rebalancing logic. Implement algorithm from PRD pseudo-code: when slider changes, locked categories remain fixed, remaining percentage redistributed proportionally among unlocked siblings. Include free mode where sliders are independent. Use React.useReducer or Zustand for state management with actions for percentage updates, lock toggling, and mode switching.
tasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for auto-balance algorithm edge cases, test locked/unlocked category behavior, verify percentage calculations remain within 0-100% bounds, test mode switching functionality, validate absolute value recalculations.

subtasks.title: Implement Core Tree State Management Hook
subtasks.description: Create useTreeState.ts hook with React.useReducer for managing tree data structure, population updates, and basic state operations
subtasks.details: Build src/hooks/useTreeState.ts using React.useReducer pattern. Implement state structure for tree nodes, total population, and current balance mode. Create actions for updating node percentages, toggling lock states, setting population, and switching balance modes. Include state validation to ensure data integrity and type safety with TypeScript interfaces.
subtasks.testStrategy: Unit tests for state reducer actions, test state updates and immutability, validate TypeScript type safety, test population changes and their effects on absolute values

subtasks.title: Build Auto-Balance Algorithm Core Logic
subtasks.description: Implement the mathematical auto-balance algorithm that redistributes percentages when sliders change while respecting locked categories
subtasks.details: Create src/hooks/useAutoBalance.ts with the core redistribution algorithm. When a slider changes: 1) Calculate remaining percentage after locked categories, 2) Distribute proportionally among unlocked siblings, 3) Maintain parent-child percentage relationships, 4) Handle edge cases like all siblings locked or insufficient percentage. Use precise decimal calculations to avoid floating-point errors.
subtasks.testStrategy: Comprehensive unit tests for algorithm edge cases: all locked scenarios, single unlocked category, zero percentages, boundary conditions (0-100%), mathematical precision validation

subtasks.title: Implement Percentage Redistribution Logic
subtasks.description: Build the percentage redistribution system that handles slider interactions and maintains tree consistency across all levels
subtasks.details: Extend useAutoBalance.ts with multi-level tree redistribution. When a node percentage changes: 1) Update absolute values based on parent's population, 2) Recalculate sibling percentages using auto-balance algorithm, 3) Propagate changes up the tree to maintain 100% totals, 4) Update child node absolute values recursively. Ensure real-time updates without performance issues.
subtasks.testStrategy: Integration tests for multi-level updates, test cascading percentage changes, validate absolute value calculations, performance tests for real-time slider interactions, test tree consistency maintenance

subtasks.title: Add Free Mode Implementation
subtasks.description: Implement free mode where sliders operate independently without auto-balance constraints
subtasks.details: Extend state management to support free mode alongside auto-balance mode. In free mode: 1) Allow independent slider adjustments without redistribution, 2) Permit totals that don't sum to 100%, 3) Show warning indicators for inconsistent percentages, 4) Maintain absolute value calculations based on actual percentages, 5) Provide smooth mode switching with state preservation where possible.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test mode switching functionality, validate independent slider behavior in free mode, test warning indicators for invalid totals, verify state preservation during mode changes, test edge cases when switching between modes

subtasks.title: Add Comprehensive Edge Case Handling and State Validation
subtasks.description: Implement robust error handling, input validation, and edge case management for the complete state management system
subtasks.details: Add comprehensive validation and error handling: 1) Input sanitization for percentage and population values, 2) Boundary checking (0-100% for percentages, positive values for population), 3) Circular dependency prevention in tree updates, 4) Recovery mechanisms for invalid states, 5) Performance optimizations for large trees, 6) Debug logging and error reporting for development.
subtasks.testStrategy: Stress testing with invalid inputs, test recovery from corrupted states, validate performance with large datasets (1000+ nodes), test memory usage and cleanup, error boundary testing, accessibility validation for state changes

tasks.title: Build Interactive Slider Components
tasks.description: Create reusable slider component with lock functionality and numerical input
tasks.details: Develop src/components/Slider/ with range slider (0-100%), numerical input field, lock/unlock toggle button, and percentage/absolute value display. Use rc-slider or custom HTML5 range input. Include visual feedback for locked state, smooth transitions, and touch-friendly design for mobile. Integrate with auto-balance logic from useAutoBalance hook.
tasks.testStrategy: Test slider interactions across different devices, validate lock functionality prevents changes during auto-balance, verify numerical input synchronization, test edge cases (0%, 100%), ensure accessibility with proper ARIA labels.

tasks.title: Implement Pie Chart Visualization Components
tasks.description: Create animated pie charts using Recharts for gender and industry distribution
tasks.details: Build src/components/PieChart/ using Recharts library with smooth animations, tooltips showing percentages and absolute values, legend components, and responsive design. Create separate charts for: main gender split, male industry distribution, female industry distribution, and expandable subcategory mini-charts. Use color palette from PRD (blue #3B82F6 for male, pink #EC4899 for female, diverse colors for industries).
tasks.testStrategy: Test chart rendering performance, verify tooltip data accuracy, test animations and transitions (60fps target), validate responsive behavior on different screen sizes, test accessibility with screen readers.

tasks.title: Create Expandable Tree Panel UI
tasks.description: Build hierarchical tree interface for navigating industry categories and subcategories
tasks.details: Develop src/components/TreePanel/ with collapsible/expandable industry sections, nested subcategory display, integration with slider components, and visual hierarchy indicators. Include expand/collapse animations, proper indentation for tree levels, and efficient rendering for 75+ subcategories. Implement lazy loading for subcategories to improve performance.
tasks.testStrategy: Test expand/collapse functionality across all industry categories, verify proper nesting visualization, test performance with all categories expanded, validate keyboard navigation and accessibility, test on mobile devices.

subtasks.title: Create TreePanel Component Structure and Basic UI
subtasks.description: Build the foundational TreePanel component with proper file structure, TypeScript interfaces, and basic tree rendering without animations
subtasks.details: Create src/components/TreePanel/ directory with index.tsx, TreeNode.tsx, TreePanel.tsx, and types.ts. Define TreeNode interface with id, label, children, isExpanded, and slider properties. Implement basic tree structure rendering with proper indentation (padding-left increments) and expand/collapse toggle buttons. Add visual hierarchy indicators using borders, background colors, and typography scaling.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test basic tree rendering, verify proper nesting structure, validate TypeScript interfaces, test expand/collapse state management without animations

subtasks.title: Implement Expand/Collapse Animations and Performance Optimization
subtasks.description: Add smooth expand/collapse animations and implement performance optimizations for handling 75+ tree items efficiently
subtasks.details: Implement CSS transitions and React.memo for tree nodes to optimize re-renders. Add height-based animations for expand/collapse using CSS transforms or Framer Motion. Implement virtual scrolling or windowing for large lists using react-window. Add useCallback and useMemo optimizations for tree operations. Include loading states and skeleton components for smooth UX.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test animation smoothness (60fps target), measure rendering performance with 75+ items expanded, validate memory usage and re-render optimization, test scroll performance on mobile devices

subtasks.title: Integrate Slider Components Within Tree Nodes
subtasks.description: Embed interactive slider components into tree nodes with proper layout and state management integration
subtasks.details: Import and integrate Slider components from Task 5 into tree nodes. Design responsive layout that accommodates sliders without breaking tree indentation. Implement state management for slider values within tree context. Add conditional rendering - sliders only appear for leaf nodes (subcategories). Handle slider lock states and auto-balance integration. Ensure sliders don't interfere with expand/collapse interactions.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test slider integration within different tree levels, verify slider functionality doesn't conflict with tree interactions, validate responsive layout on mobile, test auto-balance behavior within tree context

subtasks.title: Add Lazy Loading and Keyboard Navigation Accessibility
subtasks.description: Implement lazy loading for subcategories and comprehensive keyboard navigation with accessibility features
subtasks.details: Implement lazy loading pattern where subcategories are only rendered when parent category is expanded. Add keyboard navigation (Arrow keys for navigation, Enter/Space for expand/collapse, Tab for slider focus). Include proper ARIA attributes (aria-expanded, aria-level, role='tree'). Add focus management and visual focus indicators. Implement screen reader announcements for tree state changes. Add keyboard shortcuts documentation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test lazy loading performance improvements, validate keyboard navigation functionality across all tree levels, test with screen readers (NVDA/JAWS), verify ARIA compliance, test focus management and visual indicators

tasks.title: Build Dashboard Layout and Mode Controls
tasks.description: Create main dashboard layout with header controls, population input, and mode toggle
tasks.details: Implement src/components/ModeToggle/ for auto/free balance switching, src/components/SummaryBar/ for total population input and statistics display, and main App.tsx layout following PRD wireframe structure. Include reset to defaults button, warning indicators when percentages don't sum to 100% in free mode, and responsive grid layout for desktop/tablet/mobile.
tasks.testStrategy: Test layout responsiveness across screen sizes (320px+ mobile, 1024px+ desktop), verify mode toggle functionality, validate population input formatting and calculations, test reset functionality with confirmation modal.

tasks.details: Wire up all components in App.tsx with shared state, implement <100ms update performance for slider-to-chart synchronization, add smooth CSS transitions and animations, optimize re-rendering with React.memo and useMemo. Include calculation utilities in src/utils/ for absolute value updates and number formatting with Ukrainian locale (space as thousands separator).

subtasks.description: Wire up all components in App.tsx with shared state management system, connecting sliders, charts, and tree navigation components through the useTreeState hook
subtasks.details: Integrate all components (sliders, charts, tree navigation) in App.tsx using the useTreeState hook. Configure the main application layout and component hierarchy.

subtasks.title: Implement performance optimization with React.memo and useMemo
subtasks.description: Optimize component re-rendering performance to achieve <100ms update latency for slider-to-chart synchronization using React optimization techniques
subtasks.details: Apply React.memo to prevent unnecessary re-renders of components that haven't changed. Implement useMemo for expensive calculations like chart data transformations and tree traversals. Use useCallback for event handlers to prevent function recreation. Add performance monitoring to measure slider-to-chart update latency and ensure it stays under 100ms.
subtasks.testStrategy: Use React DevTools Profiler to measure render times, test slider interactions with performance monitoring to verify <100ms update latency, validate memory usage stability

subtasks.title: Add smooth animations and Ukrainian locale formatting utilities
subtasks.description: Implement smooth CSS transitions and animations for UI interactions, plus create calculation utilities with Ukrainian number formatting
subtasks.details: Add smooth CSS transitions for slider movements, chart updates, and UI state changes. Implement 60fps animations using CSS transforms and transitions. Create src/utils/calculations.ts with functions for absolute value calculations and Ukrainian locale number formatting (space as thousands separator). Include utility functions for percentage-to-absolute conversions.
subtasks.testStrategy: Validate animations run at 60fps using browser dev tools, test Ukrainian number formatting with various values, verify smooth transitions during rapid slider interactions

subtasks.title: Comprehensive performance testing and memory leak prevention

subtasks.details: Set up comprehensive performance testing using Lighthouse to achieve >90 performance score. Add performance monitoring for multiple simultaneous slider interactions and validate stable memory usage over extended use periods.
